download.title: Get Started
download.subtitle: Windows and macOS installers always point to the latest stable GitHub release

core.keyboard: Keyboard‑first ergonomics: minimize mouse travel and clicks; frequent actions are one shortcut away
core.dedup: Content‑aware dedup (ignores metadata): detect duplicates by audio features with import‑time prompts
core.wysiwyg: WYSIWYG file mapping: UI groups/folders mirror the real disk hierarchy; rename/move applies instantly

extra.waveform: Multiple waveform views: SoundCloud classic, fine-grained waveform, and RGB three-band energy to spot transitions instantly
extra.formats: Wide format playback & conversion: Built-in FFmpeg pipeline covers 20+ DJ and archival formats with batch transcoding
extra.metadata: Online metadata enrichment: search track metadata by conditions, or match directly via audio fingerprint
extra.crossOpen: Cross‑platform and open‑source: Windows / macOS; inspect and contribute

faq.title: FAQ
q1: Pick Windows or macOS according to your system.
q2: We cover mp3, wav, flac, aif/aiff, ogg, opus, aac, m4a, mp4, wma, ac3, dts, mka, webm, ape, tak, tta, wv, and more — play instantly and batch convert out of the box.
q3: The app supports online auto‑updates; no manual download needed.
q4: See License and contributing guide on GitHub.

open.title: Open Source
open.content: Open source; feedback and contributions are welcome.
